alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 6:33PM EDT until August 04 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bennington County in southern Vermont... Northern Windham County in southern Vermont... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 633 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Wardsboro, or near Stratton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Londonderry, Townshend, Stratton, Putney, Saxtons River, Newfane, West Wardsboro, Windham, Rockingham, Jamaica, Wardsboro, Grafton, Brookline, Athens, Wardsboro Center, Brockways Mills, South Windham, Dummerston Center, East Jamaica and Bartonsville. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
